column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=Last night I had plans to go out to dinner with some friends .
#id=2
#text=I arrived home from work and began to get ready to go out .
#id=3
#text=I gathered a towel and my robe and headed to the bathroom .
#id=4
#text=I had plenty of time so I decided to take a nice long bath .
#id=5
#text=I put the stopper in the drain and adjusted the temperature of the water .
#id=6
#text=I allowed the tub to fill about two-thirds of the way full and stepped inside .
#id=7
#text=I sank into the warm water with a sigh .
#id=8
#text=The water felt great and helped me relax .
#id=9
#text=I grabbed a wash cloth from the side of the tub and rubbed the soap against the cloth .
#text=I worked it into a rich lather and preceded to wash my entire body from the head down .
#text=I then rinsed myself well , stood up , and carefully stepped out of the tub .
#text=The bath had refreshed me and I was ready for a night out .
